venue.address_2: same building as Head Games-If Free street door is locked-go around corner to entrance on Oak St.
venue.name: The Landing Center for Healing Arts

item.description:
This is a fun evening out laughing! It will provide a nice end to your work week and start to the weekend. Also, it is a great way to bridge the fun of the Art Walk and going out!
We will enjoy the practice of laughter for an hour. By using yogic breathing techniques, laughter exercises, and a sense of playfulness, you will leave feeling hopeful, energized, and feeling relaxed!
Come try Laughter Yoga!
$15 or Free if first time at The Landing Center.

If you plan on coming, please call 207 239 8667 or sign up on meet up.
Thanks!
Katie
item.how_to_find_us: Enter through the back entrance on Oak St.
item.name: First Friday Fun & Laughter after The Art Walk
